description:
Ginga Seijuurou is Ail`s human identity. He lives with his "sister" in Juuban Odyssey Apartments. While trying to blend in with the humans at Usagi`s school, Ail develops the role of brother to his girlfriend, An. He develops a crush on Usagi, and constantly tries to win her over, much to the dislike of An (and of Mamoru). He constantly denies these feelings to An, knowing her to have fits of jealous rage.
Ail uses his flute to summon Cardians, allowing An to select which one he will summon.
Source: wiki
name: Ginga Seijuurou
